description.title: Meat processing factory
description.text:
Pork processing factory with a capacity of 470 thousand tons per year. The complex consists of 33 buildings of various purposes and sizes. The main building with an area of 14.5 thousand m2 consists of a steel frame with reinforced concrete columns. Administrative buildings are made of reinforced concrete.

The construction of the plant is completed in 2016.

XTF developed a full set of structural documentation: geological engineering, foundations design, steel frame, reinforced concrete columns design, all equipment foundations and facade systems design, etc.

description.title: Warehouse
description.text:
Warehouse building for storage of construction tools and building materials 1000 м2, volume 9830 м3. Steel frame and precast wall panels.

XTF developed a full set of structural and architectural documentation for this.

Built in 2015.
